values: To shatter something means to break it suddenly into many tiny pieces.
When the ball hit the window, the glass shattered.
vt. 打碎；破掉；使散开；粉碎；破坏
vi. 粉碎；损坏；落叶
n. 碎片；乱七八糟的状态
时态:shattered, shattering, shatters
